name: Artista - Exactus Connecticut - Robusto
additionalNotes: Exactus comes from humble beginnings that date back to El Artista’s founding in 1956. A classic blend that appeals to all smokers, Exactus was developed, blended, and headed up by Radhames “Ram” Rodriguez, the grandson of company founder Don Pulita. Ram sought to blend a cigar using a specially fermented leaf he helped develop. Comes with strong barnyard notes with undertones of hay and sweet lemon zest. With  Shade-Grown Connecticut Seed wrapper, Dominican Criollo ‘98 binder and Specially fermented Dominican blend filler.
